statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 2 \\ 4 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ 5 \\ 10 \\ 26 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
